text: Hi I have completed the HubSpot developer certification
I need help to develop boilerplate theme

Hi Sonu, I would recommend starting here with our documentation about themes: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/themes>

I would then look at our Getting started with themes guide here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/getting-started-with-themes>
Hi everyone I am a UX designer working on a theme for the HubSpot hackathon. I have little developing experience so I hope joining on here will be of great help!

Hi Katherine, Themes do require comfort in HTML and CSS. Comfort in HubL will also substantially help in building out your theme. That said starting from the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/themes/HubSpot-cms-boilerplate|HubSpot theme boilerplate> is a great way to get up and running quickly, without needing a ton of experience building on HubSpot.

If you’d prefer to work on a team I’d suggest posting in <#C2YGWHDKQ|marketplace> that you are looking for a group and let folks know you’re a UX designer. I guarantee that’s a skillset that almost any team, or even individual in the theme challenge would be excited to have on board.

Another good place to look is. <https://HubSpot.devpost.com/participants?search%5Bteam_setting%5D%5B%5D=1>

These are the folks registered for the theme challenge who specified they’re looking for teamates.

Hi everyone.
Am Enock, a Software Developer and I am just getting started on using HubSpot for development as an Intern. I hope joining this channel will help me get myself going with developing websites using HubSpot.
Thank you
Hello. I'm Lane, a software developer and I'm getting started on HubSpot to learn about their API for a potential integration.
